verses.verse: The <S%H1486>lot<s%> for the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%> was to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> even to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin<s%> <S%H5045>southward,<s%> at the uttermost <S%H7097>part<s%> of the <S%H8486>south.<s%>

Their <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%> was from the uttermost <S%H7097>part<s%> of the <S%H4417>Salt<s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%> from the <S%H3956>bay<s%> that <S%H6437>looks<s%> <S%H5045>southward;<s%>

and it went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H5045>southward<s%> of the <S%H5045>ascent<s%> of <S%H4610>Akrabbim,<s%> and <S%H5674>passed<s%> along to <S%H6790>Zin,<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> by the south of Kadesh <S%H6947>Barnea,<s%> and <S%H5674>passed<s%> along by <S%H2696>Hezron,<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H146>Addar,<s%> and turned <S%H5437>about<s%> to <S%H7173>Karka;<s%>

and it <S%H5674>passed<s%> along to <S%H6111>Azmon,<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> at the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H8444>ended<s%> at the <S%H3220>sea.<s%> This shall be your <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H1366>border.<s%>

The <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%> was the <S%H4417>Salt<s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%> even to the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%> The <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>quarter<s%> was from the <S%H3956>bay<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

The <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to Beth <S%H1031>Hoglah,<s%> and <S%H5674>passed<s%> along by the <S%H6828>north<s%> of Beth <S%H1026>Arabah;<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H68>stone<s%> of <S%H932>Bohan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben.<s%>

The <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H1688>Debir<s%> from the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H5911>Achor,<s%> and so <S%H6828>northward,<s%> <S%H6437>looking<s%> toward <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> that is over <S%H5227>against<s%> the <S%H4608>ascent<s%> of <S%H131>Adummim,<s%> which is on the south <S%H5045>side<s%> of the <S%H5158>river.<s%> The <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> along to the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of En <S%H5885>Shemesh,<s%> and <S%H8444>ended<s%> at En <S%H5883>Rogel.<s%>

The <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> by the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom<s%> to the <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%> <S%H5045>southward<s%> (the same is <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>); and the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> that lies <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom<s%> <S%H3220>westward,<s%> which is at the farthest <S%H7097>part<s%> of the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim<s%> <S%H6828>northward.<s%>

The <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H8388>extended<s%> from the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> to the <S%H4599>spring<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H5318>Nephtoah,<s%> and went <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6085>Ephron;<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H8388>extended<s%> to <S%H1173>Baalah<s%> (the same is Kiriath <S%H7157>Jearim<s%>);

and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5437>turned<s%> about from <S%H1173>Baalah<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%> to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> and <S%H5674>passed<s%> along to the <S%H3802>side<s%> of <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H3297>Jearim<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> (the same is <S%H3693>Chesalon<s%>), and went <S%H3381>down<s%> to Beth <S%H1053>Shemesh,<s%> and passed <S%H5674>along<s%> by <S%H8553>Timnah;<s%>

and the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H3802>side<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> <S%H6828>northward;<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H8388>extended<s%> to <S%H7942>Shikkeron,<s%> and passed <S%H5674>along<s%> to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H1173>Baalah,<s%> and went <S%H3318>out<s%> at <S%H2995>Jabneel;<s%> and the goings <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H1366>border<s%> were at the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

The <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%> was to the <S%H5439>shore<s%> of the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea.<s%> This is the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

To <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> a <S%H2506>portion<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H413>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> even <S%H7151>Kiriath<s%> <S%H704>Arba,<s%> named after the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak<s%> (the same is <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>).

<S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H3423>drove<s%> out the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak:<s%> <S%H8344>Sheshai,<s%> and <S%H289>Ahiman,<s%> and <S%H8526>Talmai,<s%> the <S%H3211>children<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak.<s%>
He went <S%H5927>up<s%> against the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1688>Debir:<s%> now the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1688>Debir<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> was Kiriath <S%H7158>Sepher.<s%>

<S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "He who <S%H5221>strikes<s%> Kiriath <S%H7158>Sepher,<s%> and <S%H3920>takes<s%> <S%H5414>it,<s%> to him will I give <S%H5915>Achsah<s%> my <S%H1323>daughter<s%> as <S%H802>wife.<s%>"

<S%H6274>Othniel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7073>Kenaz,<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3612>Caleb,<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H5414>it:<s%> and he gave him <S%H5915>Achsah<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> as <S%H802>wife.<s%>

It <S%H935>happened,<s%> when she came, that she <S%H5496>had<s%> him <S%H7592>ask<s%> her <S%H1>father<s%> for a <S%H7704>field.<s%> She got <S%H6795>off<s%> of her <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> and <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "What do you want?"

She <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5414>"Give<s%> me a <S%H1293>blessing.<s%> Because you have <S%H5414>set<s%> me in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H5045>South,<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> me also <S%H1543>springs<s%> of <S%H4325>water.<s%>" He <S%H5414>gave<s%> her the <S%H5942>upper<s%> <S%H1543>springs<s%> and the <S%H8482>lower<s%> <S%H1543>springs.<s%>
This is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

The <S%H7097>farthest<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> toward the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> in the <S%H5045>South<s%> were <S%H6909>Kabzeel,<s%> <S%H5740>Eder,<s%> <S%H3017>Jagur,<s%>
<S%H3822>Lebaoth,<s%> <S%H7978>Shilhim,<s%> <S%H5871>Ain,<s%> and <S%H7417>Rimmon.<s%> All the <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H6242>twenty-nine,<s%> <S%H8672><s%> with their <S%H2691>villages.<s%>
from <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> even to the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> all that were <S%H3027>by<s%> the side of <S%H795>Ashdod,<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages.<s%>

<S%H795>Ashdod,<s%> its <S%H1323>towns<s%> and its <S%H2691>villages;<s%> <S%H5804>Gaza,<s%> its <S%H1323>towns<s%> and its <S%H2691>villages;<s%> to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> with its <S%H1366>coastline.<s%>
<S%H2547>Humtah,<s%> Kiriath <S%H7153>Arba<s%> (the same is <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>), and <S%H6730>Zior;<s%> <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages.<s%>
Kiriath <S%H7154>Baal<s%> (the same is Kiriath <S%H7157>Jearim<s%>), and <S%H7237>Rabbah;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages.<s%>
<S%H5044>Nibshan,<s%> the City of <S%H5898>Salt,<s%> and En <S%H5872>Gedi;<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages.<s%>

As for the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3201>couldn't<s%> drive them <S%H3423>out;<s%> but the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%> <S%H3427>live<s%> with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>
